product_name: FuelBelt Helium Super Stretch Race Hydration Belt
long_description: Lightweight and ready to race, this belt has space for essentials such as your phone, ID, keys and nutrition, plus attachment points for your race number so they know who's crossing the finish line.
short_description: Lightweight and ready to race, this belt has space for essentials such as your phone, ID, keys and nutrition, plus attachment points for your race number so they know who's crossing the finish line.
